org.yamcs.http.api

Class RestHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.yamcs.http.RouteHandler
      • org.yamcs.http.api.RestHandler
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ArchiveCommandRestHandler, ArchiveDownloadRestHandler, ArchiveIndexDownloadsRestHandler, ArchiveTableRestHandler, CcsdsTmIndex.CcsdsTmIndexRestHandler, ClientRestHandler, MdbRestHandler, ProcessorCommandQueueRestHandler, ProcessorRestHandler, SimulationTimeService.SimTimeRestHandler

    public abstract class RestHandler
extends RouteHandler
    Contains utility methods for REST handlers. May eventually refactor this out.
